name: OR_LNLG_LSC_GAS_USED
description: This table contains documentation regarding the gas used when using lasers.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_GAS_USED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document whether anesthesia gases were in use during laser usage.
